text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Did you wear a mask, unlike when you didn't wear one at the @MayoClinic? #WearADamnMask I work a mask lastnight when I was at the @MayoClinic. Did the #coronavirus #Taskforce discuss the #TrumpVirus? https://t.co/tPbQ3TClvT
